title: Board Stickers
body:
Are there .jpg files of the board stickers? I'd like to use a few on my discord as custom emotes.
Thanks!

replies.body: I don't believe any of us have those stickers saved elsewhere that you could easily grab them, but you might have a relatively easy time using something like Gyazo to grab those images yourself. You can use that tool to easily grab screencaps of those images and then save them locally for use later.
